system.effect: Prerequisites: Minor Gift – Fount of Knowledge 3 AP - Standard Action Target: Pokémon or Trainer within 8 meters Effect: Choose an effect: The Target has one Ability disabled at random or two Moves disabled at random for the remainder of the Encounter. Additionally, the Target must make a Focus Check with DC 10 to recall complex thoughts and memories for the next fifteen minutes. The target becomes immune to further uses of Shatter Memory for 24 hours.
